text: @realDonaldTrump This is so disgusting. Wall Street is not the economy. Poor people don't own stocks. Meanwhile nearly 3 million cases of Covid-19 in the US and 131,357 Americans dead from the virus and you say nothing. #TrumpLiedPeopleDied
